thread.section_title: Tungsten World Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Tungsten World | www.tungstenworld.com
thread.title: Jana Campbell Goodwin
thread.title_full: Tungsten World reviewed by Jana Campbell Goodwin

author: Jana Campbell Goodwin
title: Jana Campbell Goodwin
text: I ordered the ring going down a half size like they suggested... was VERY IMPRESSED on how fast I got the order (ordered Friday received Monday) unfortunately ring was a little small but they corrected it immediately and had my next ring by the following Monday! VERY VERY VERY IMPRESSED The engraving on my ring was perfect! I'm a hair stylist and EVERYONE will know exactly how pleased and impressed I am and will be ordering from them again in the future Thanks a million ðŸ˜‡
